name: The flames of Damnation!
description:
You play as a dark Wizard who has stolen the Flames of Damnation from the underworld. He must go back Unlocking the power of the flame. and obviously killing all the monsters he encounters!

CONTROLS

  • Move : A, D
  • Jump: Space
  • Shoot FireBall: Left Mouse
  • Recall FireBall: Left Mouse
  • First PowerUp Speed Up: Q
  • First PowerUp Chage Rotation: W
  • Second PowerUp Teleport: Right Click 
  • Third PowerUp: E

MISSING

  • Loading Screen betwin each level... didn't have time
  • A proper Main Menu/Ingame Menu... 
  • Camera shaking... Was doing it but.... i did prefer to add another ability to the boss
